attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app I thought it would be a great way to be closer to our president, but minutes after downloading the app I was hacked and all my personal info was completely taken from me. This app is terrible PLEASE do not get it unless you’re looking to get hacked
attributes.title: Worst app on the market

attributes.review: This app is terrible!! It kept crashing and the set up is just so ugly! I literally almost threw up when i saw the orange man when I first opened the app. Do not download it!!
attributes.title: Ugly orange man!

attributes.review: Water. Earth. Fire. Air. Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang. And although his airbending skills are great, he has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone. But I believe Aang can save the world.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I tried downloading this app, but I took 69 whole days. I used to like trump, but this app is garbage, and has caused me to see how stupid his hair really looks. I will be voting for jo Jorgensen, and it’s all because of this stupid app that didn’t even download till 4:20 this afternoon
attributes.title: I can’t believe I wasted my time

attributes.review: When it was finally done downloading I opened it and my phone was instantly hacked  had to restart my phone
attributes.title: DO NOT GET

attributes.review: The app was offensive as it screamed all lives matter and that lgtbq people don’t. It was also very glitchy. Would not recommend.
attributes.title: Glitchy and offensive app

attributes.review: I don’t know why this even exits. Like it doesn’t even work. Just terrible!😤 I would give zero stars if I could. Smh.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: It took me about 3 months 3 weeks and 3 days to finish DOWNLOADING IT!!  Once it finished I opened the app to an old Orange 🍊 HE SAID HE WANTED MY INFORMATION or else he would RAPE MY RAT!!! I don’t even know how it knows I have pet rats! Of course like a normal human being I didn’t touch that app. I asked my rats if I should or shouldn’t give it my info because I love my rats! they said ⚠️NOTHING ⚠️!!!!! MY RATS ARE NEVER QUITE!! Later that day I was about to give my rats food 3 OF MY RATS TURNED INTO ORANGE WEREWOLVES!! They tried TO EAT ME!! I opened the app so fast I almost fainted I gave it my info and if you haven’t guessed it yup it HACKED ME THE MONEY I USED FOR MY RATS THAT MONEY (IT WAS THE ONLY MONEY I HAD) WAS STOLEN LATER THAT DAY!!!!!!!!!!! I DELETED THE APP BUT MY RATS TURNED INTO STONE AND STOPPED MOVING But I always catch them POLE DANCING (MY CAT WAS THE POLE) HORRENDOUS APP DO NOT GET IT!!‼️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE DISGUSTING TERRIBLE HATE IT!!!

attributes.review:
